verses.verse: O <S%H3212>come,<s%> let us <S%H7442>sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> let us make a joyful noise to the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of our <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>
Let us <S%H6923>come<s%> <S%H6924>before<s%> his <S%H6440>presence<s%> with <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> and make a joyful noise to him with <S%H2158>psalms.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>
In his <S%H3027>hand<s%> are the <S%H4278>deep<s%> places of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> the <S%H8443>strength<s%> of the <S%H2022>hills<s%> is his also.
The <S%H3220>sea<s%> is his, and he <S%H6213>made<s%> it: and his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H3335>formed<s%> the <S%H3006>dry<s%> land.
O <S%H935>come,<s%> let us <S%H7812>worship<s%> and <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H3766>down:<s%> let us <S%H1288>kneel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H6213>maker.<s%>

For he is our <S%H430>God;<s%> and we are the <S%H5971>people<s%> of his <S%H4830>pasture,<s%> and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of his <S%H3027>hand.<s%> To <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H8085>hear<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%>
<S%H7185>Harden<s%> not your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> as in the <S%H4808>provocation,<s%> and as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4531>temptation<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%>

<S%H705>Forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> long was I <S%H6962>grieved<s%> with this <S%H1755>generation,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> It is a <S%H5971>people<s%> that do <S%H8582>err<s%> in their <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and they have not <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H1870>ways:<s%>
To <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> in my <S%H639>wrath<s%> that they should not <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> my <S%H4496>rest.<s%>
